website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and well-built, this model stands out for the 360-degree rotating wheels, which make moving heavy items a snap, even over non-flat surfaces.
pros: The 29 by 19 inch platform compares favorably to similar hand trucks, and the no-slip rubber surface is a great feature
Wheels make smooth turns, even on surfaces that aren't perfectly flat or smooth
The inclusion of a center backing piece on the handle is helpful with taller loads
cons: While the wheels are maneuverable, users report they require frequent tightening and are difficult to reach when unit is assembled

website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch platform truck is sturdy, durable, and compact.
pros: Features a load capacity of 330 pounds
Includes a custom support guard that ensures items won't move backward when the platform truck is in use
Sold in a variety of colors
cons: May be too small for some users
Wheels may fall off, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: I would not trust this thing anything heavier than 200lbs
customer_reviews.text: Got this in December & didnt put in use til First week of July, it says will haul 660lbs, we never put anything heavier than 200lbs, we were using to haul 35 gallans trash cans to our Dumpster, failed badly. Be honet, Plastic trash cans are tougher than this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jatt Pannu

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. I bought it for two reasons. One, I am moving to a new apartment and knew I would need help moving heavy boxes to the moving trailer. Second, this cart is foldable and will be perfect for stacking water bottles and groceries to take from my car to my 4th floor apartment. It steers easy and it took me about 10-15 minutes to put the wheels on. It looks fragile, but when I sat on it, the cart’s platform did not budge. I was able to be pushed around on it! I’m looking forward to all the use I will get out of this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Riss Segers

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, folds easily to fit in your car.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a cart for hauling luggage in and out of hotels during a cross country trip (we do not travel light). This cart worked perfectly for us. Cart folds so it takes very little space in the car. I had several people ask me where I got it. Cart is very sturdy. During our trip we loaded it with two large suitcases, two coolers, and several smaller bags. Glides easily even when fully loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing handy truck
customer_reviews.text: The handy push cart is awesome. Assembling or hooking up the four tires is a simple and easy task. It’s light weight and good enough space to put things on. It’s easy to pack it together and save room for storage. I highly recommend this product to people who needs this handy gadget to help moving things around.
customer_reviews.author: D Lau

customer_reviews.title: NOPE. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made cheap Chinese product. Third bolt wouldn't thread properly. I stopped and packed it back up for return. The wheels are plastic instead of what I presumed were polyurethane based on the look. The handle and the base seem sturdy. The base has a good bumper around the perimeter. I don't want to have to tap one of the threads or risk marring up a floor at one of my gigs with one of these crappy wheels. Better to return now vs out of $80 in 31+. Make sure you get POLYURETHANE wheels for a cart rated at 600lbs.
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Very, very loud
customer_reviews.text: When rolling over hard surfaces (e.g. hardwood floors, streets, brick), this dolly is very loud. It's embarrassing when people are nearby because of how loud this is. The casters definitely need improvements. Only get this product if you don't care if the dolly is quiet or not. It unfortunately isn't usable for me because I'm sure my neighbors will complain. The handles on the dolly are pretty low so there's no way to push it around without hunching. The dolly feels like a child's toy and the material feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for what may seem unusual!
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen with a large (long) cat who requires a large carrier. The carrier weighs about 15 pounds for a total of about 25 pounds. The carrier fits very nicely on the dolly and makes it much easier for me to transport the cat from my house to my car and from my car to the clinic for Vet appointments. It takes up very little room and fits well in a closet and in the car when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It was nice the first two times we used it. The wheel lost its gasket and now will not roll. Waste of money. Great idea. Poor execution
customer_reviews.author: Connie Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! I bought this for when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! I bought this for when I was moving, so I'd be able to put large/heavy products and boxes on it to move my stuff without breaking my back... HOWEVER, once weight is applied to the dolly bed, it becomes nearly impossible to steer! It takes more energy to maneuver the thing than it would to have just carried it/moved it by hand! The wheels are so wonky, constantly turning in every direction BUT straight! VERY disappointed in this product... made moving a living hell!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice dolly but only one set of wheels swivels.
customer_reviews.text: The cart works as advertised. It's also relatively lightweight, which means its easy to pick up and put in the car or store it. The reason for the 3 rating is that only one set of wheels swivels. This makes it difficult to guide the dolly around corners. Also, the floor of the dolly is covered with a thin piece of black plastic which tears easily. Underneath is metal. It would have been better to have the floor covered with thick black rubber. Neither of these factors (wheels or cover) prevents one from using the dolly to transport heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cart
customer_reviews.text: I particularly like the cart's weight, compactness, and maneuverability. We purchased the 330 lb capacity model which is all we need for household use. My wife and I can easily carry it around our property. It's folding feature allows for easy storage. The rear 360-degree swivel wells allow for easy turning. Finally, assembly is a no-brainer (only necessitating affixing the four wheels to the platform). Even I could do it quickly, and I can easily be dexterity challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Chip HIlton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight for storing and hauling heavy or ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight for storing and hauling heavy or bulky items like groceries to and from the store to my apartment. Folds easily and fits in the trunk of my car or rear passenger area. I highly recommend that you CHECK AND TIGHTEN ALL of the bolts and nuts before using. I found all of them were very loose when installed at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL E.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purchase I made on Amazon. It couldn’t possibly hold the weight the seller claims. The wheels constantly stick and won’t swivel on concrete flat floors. That is with a couple 5 gallon jugs of water. Not even 1 star but I had to give it a star.
customer_reviews.author: jeff c.

customer_reviews.title: it looked exactly like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cart for moving into a new place. I stumbled on this one, looks neat. After receiving it, it looked exactly like in the picture, actually more brighter red in real life. I really don’t like to install stuff especially if I have to do it myself. But this dolly cart came with instruction and a wrench needed for the installation. It was pretty easy process. Even though the capacity is 330lb, I think I might have overloaded a few times and It didn’t break down, so I was happy about that. Overall, I am pleased with the product, hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for moving a variety of stuff
customer_reviews.text: This cart was a lifesaver during a recent move. The apartment we were moving out of was on the top floor of the building with the only parking in a nearby public lot. Having this cart saved us from having to make a gazillion trips with all the boxes and furniture we had to move. We were able to load several boxes at a time and also place some of the bigger, heavier items on it like an armoire and really heavy display cabinet. The move went noticeably faster from when we moved into the apartment a year ago without this handy cart. Definitely worth the cost, which I thought was a great price to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: c.hess

customer_reviews.title: Light, strong, padded sides, and strong plastic wheels that don’t mark floors.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a data Cabling job in a multistory building, and put it through its paces for a week. We probably put 50 miles on it in parking lots, loading zones, carpets, tile, marble, wood flooring, and even got caught in a rain storm. It is so light, I could fold it up and carry it up stairs to save steps on a few occasions. It folds so compact, We pushed around 200 lb. computer cabinets and could maneuver them in small elevators.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J. Denson

customer_reviews.title: This unit is just too small and there is no good way to secure items being hauled with bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use at trade show booths, but replaced with the Wesco Industrial Products 270389 Aluminum Long Deck Truck with Folding Handle. This unit is just too small and there is no good way to secure items being hauled with bungee cords.It seems sturdy enough, but just not functional for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's  an incredible piece of equipment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work frequently, and some of my luggage, and parcels are quite heavy; but with this amazingly lightweight hand truck, I can easily move heavy items with a single trip. The hand truck is sturdy and capable of holding well over 300 lbs., and the swivel wheels make it very maneuverable. I ordered it over three weeks ago; but had need to use it for the first time yesterday...outstanding quality, love the red color, and I feel it was well worth the money spent. I look forward to using it for many, many years. Thank you Wellmax... Amazon you've done it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Back!
customer_reviews.text: This little cart saved my back when we moved! I sat the box on it, loaded it, and easily moved it to the moving van. Held some pretty heavy boxes and it is very sturdy. I put the turning wheels on the front as recommended on another review and it made it super easy to get from room to room. I also use it to bring cases of water in from the car to the house, heavy bags of garbage out to the garbage can......anything that is too heavy for me to carry. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Fergie

customer_reviews.title: Love this product with a great support staff.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for getting my amplifier to the car from the 3rd floor of an apartment building. I also use this dolly to to get my groceries to the apartment. I had a small issue with this dolly which i do not wish to discuss here because it was so small the support staff went above and beyond to satisfy my concern. A great dolly, and I recommend anyone who needs a sturdy dolly to take a look at this product.
customer_reviews.author: Long time purchaser.

customer_reviews.title: Push cart
customer_reviews.text: Well built and quality cart. We will use the cart for moving items from a distant closet to the car. Good wheels that are easy on the flooring. The screws for holding the wheels (assembly) were somewhat difficult to put in. Don't know if one or two were poorly threaded or paint was in the threaded hole. I used my own tools as the wrench provided is nice to have but not sure if it would work well to tighten. Overall, we are very happy and it is a quality,,,lifetime or longer...cart.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great cart for the money. As I use the cart over outside surfaces, I added three strips of grip tape to the blue insert on the base...boxes will now stay on the cart without the need to secure them with bungee cords.
customer_reviews.author: MeridianX

customer_reviews.title: Not great for tall people and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why it's so hard to find a decent platform cart in 2020 that doesnt cost a lot. This was not the cheapest, but I dont get why they are charging $60 for this. It's not perfect when trying to maneuver it, but whatever. My biggest gripe is this thing must have been made for very short people. I'm 6'2 and when I push this thing I basically have to bend so far down I'm practically touching my feet. If this thing only cost $20-30 it would be fine, but $60 for this is nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: pcfresca

customer_reviews.title: It is however compact and folds up easily. Great for moving kids in and out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Was loving it at first but after a few loads less than 200lbs, one of the swivel wells keeps getting stuck. May have to return if vendor is unable to send me a wheel replacement. It is however compact and folds up easily. Great for moving kids in and out of dorm...stack containers and go.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Needs locking casters .
customer_reviews.text: A few of the bolts for the casters were hard to get started. They weren't drilled perfectly for the plate on the casters. Also, because this thing has such big wheels, which makes it easy to roll (positive feature), it also rolls away if you leave it anywhere unattended. I used this as a cart for my pressure washer. It just wanders off unless I prop it up against something. I'll have to go spend money on locking casters now, at least for the swiveling ones which I put on the front. I think the swivels should come with locking ones, even if they raise the price by a couple bucks
customer_reviews.author: Var

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is, but wish it was better...
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to personal need/use. But not a terrible dolly. It was easy to assemble, but annoying simply because the tool that came with it doesn't really work that well so I had to use my own. Maneuverability is an absolute pain. Going forward is easy, but making turns is a headache and a half. Other reviewers say that they get used to it, but I didn't keep it long enough to find out. The best feature is the folding, so easy a small child could do it! Folding is not flat though and with the wheels on the other side... Not the worst too store, but I was hoping for something a bit thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani N. Elderts

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: I have had other flatbed hand trucks in the past that were mostly plastic, so this one is superior for the same/lesser price. It could, however, be a 5 star rating if the entire bed of it (the platform) were covered in rubber. There is a thin rubber mat that lies inside upraised metal corners, which means that the corners immediately got the pain knocked off of them when I placed the items on top of the cart that I intend to store and carry on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received the cart today. The box was a shambles, all torn up with package tape holding it together. Nothing was broken and luckily all of the parts were there. The hardware was in an open, yes open bag and were falling out of the box. The hardware bag is usually sealed with tape or something else to hold them in. Some of the bolts fell out as I moved it into my garage. The delivery driver found some of the bolts and washers in his van. The cart is excellent, well made and sturdy. Lost one star for packaging.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Use it almost daily
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket! Small enough that it is easy to store and isn't too heavy, but strong enough to handle any load that I can fit on it. This model doesn't have brakes for the wheels, but I haven't found a need for them. This was the only option that I though I might want, but I'm not missing it. Initially, I felt that the bed of the cart was too small, but with use it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: this arrived with damage and I can tell from the packing that was not damaged in shipping but that it was shipped damaged. on the front one whole corner is bent down and rubber torn and there is also random white paint in several places that shouldn't be. since I didn't think to inspect it before I put the wheels on I decided not to take it apart and send the huge thing back--it won't affect the way it works-it just looks bad--especially for something that costs this much. much higher than I would have paid for a similar one at Harbor Freight if they weren't out and having problems getting them back in....would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Who

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good dolly. It's smaller than I expected, but I guess I just didn't pay attention to the dimensions. Small size has it's benefits - very convenient to carry it (or two of them) in a car. The size is just good to fit 60 quart Iris storage boxes, along the longest side of them, and you can stack plenty. Pros: - it works. Cons: - need to spend 20 minutes assembling the wheels. - it's terribly noisy. - it doesn't have brakes, and it slides very easily. Given it's just $60 each, I think it's still worthy of a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufactured
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly manufactured item. The bolt heads stripped and the threaded inserts also stripped when you tighten the bolts. The wrench included is the wrong size. I used an adjustable wrench. I had to tap new threads into the inserts and replace the bolts with hardened steel bolts. I have tool-room at home but not many people do. This is typical of products made in China. Poor material quality and they cut corners in their manufacturing processes. At the very least, the bolts should have been hardened. Buy American made and you won't regret it. Amazon should insist that country of origin or manufacture HAS TO BE LISTED.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected. It was not as big as I was thinking it would be but it was supposed to hold up to I think 400 lbs or so but as soon as anything heavy is on it it's topples or flips up it's very difficult to maneuver with only one set of swivel wheels the handle is way too short and since the wheels don't lock in place very difficult to load heavy objects or boxes on the platform without it moving it serves some whatever purpose but overall I really am seriously contemplating getting my money back
customer_reviews.author: Desirée The Scorpion Queen Pugh

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't give this a thorough test yet, but so far, moving plastic storage tubs/totes from my car to my shed, over rough terrain, and up a ramp, has been very easy. It feels sturdy. I will update this in a week or so, after my planned big move.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Montana

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and recently downsized. The smaller cart is easy for me to load and use. Allows you to move a number of boxes/materials at one time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Scarpinato

customer_reviews.title: Great  cart. Excellent utility, but you must attach the wheels yourself.
customer_reviews.text: This push cart has saved my life, and my back. Am putting boxes in storage and decluttering. This cart did the trick when it came time to stacking boxes on it, pulling it into the elevator, and getting stuff moved into the car. Holds a lot of weight. (see weight specs). Handle section folds down easily, and the entire cart will stand upright and flat to store it. Easily slides into the back of my car too. Warning - cart does not come pre-assembled; you must attach the wheels onto the cart when you get it. So follow the instructions for how to properly attach the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Capable
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and we used this trolley extensively. It's easy to assemble and folds up into a reasonably compact size. It stores easily in the garage and is sturdy enough to handle several large boxes or pieces of furniture without any issues. We had several extremely heavy boxes on it on numerous locations and it handles the weight easily. We've used it much more than we ever expected to. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Walorado

customer_reviews.title: Cutest cart I ever did see!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get some stereo equipment off the floor and stored into my closet. I used my own wrench as the little wrench they gave me really did not fit tight on the nuts. Other than that, it was extremely easy to put the wheels on and unfold the handle. The cart rolls so easy and maneuvers pretty good. I got all the equipment on it which weighed about 200 pounds-cart was good for 300 pounds. Rolled it right into the closet-I measured everything before buying. If you move stuff around in the house or need to pick-up a bulky heavy item, this is the cart you need. Really considering getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: MFR, makes a sturdy cart (which comes in several sizes); we've used them for YEARS.
customer_reviews.text: First purchase was (20?) yrs ago from another seller. We wanted a cart suitable for carrying a large cage with 3 big cats in it to and from the car. As we aged, we started using it to transport mulch bags, potting soil, groceries, etc., to and from the car from and to the house/back yard, etc. This is the second cart - first one bent slightly when I overloaded it (about double its capacity) with cinderblocks and tried to lever it up two steps onto a porch. That cart still works OK, but we decided we needed a backup just in case.
customer_reviews.author: johnjorg

customer_reviews.title: not whats advertised,
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship is very poor. The rubber bumper does not go all the way around the cart, and what is there fell off. This is how it was delivered. The package did not look damaged. Not worth the money. I will see if I can super glue what is left of the bumper. The is a 2 foot section of bumper missing from the handle end of the platform. I should have bought something or someone else's. Hopefully the super glue will work. However, I will not recommend this product and manufacturer to anyone. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Roger Melanson

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Push Cart Dolly
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, the best push cart dolly I've ever had in terms of quality, ease of use, and flexibility. The packaging was first rate, to me always a sign of company that cares about its products. I bought it to help with moving large items to a storage unit, and it worked perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: Came in super handy during our move
customer_reviews.text: Came in super handy during our move. Super easy to put together and works great. Maneuvers well and is a bargain on the price. Tried other products from our local hardware stores only to return them as they were not easy to use. i like the fact that you can easily fold it by the foot handle. Also comes in a slightly larger size if thats what you want.
customer_reviews.author: matsam

customer_reviews.title: Good dolly for smaller jobs
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easily portable flatbed dolly for taking supplies from my car to meetings and events. This one is lightweight and works well for that purpose. It is small but holds 2 average size boxes side by side and I’ve stacked 2-3 high easily. It folds easily and is easy to lift when empty. You’ll need to put the wheels on but that only takes 10 minutes - then it is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Holiday Moving
customer_reviews.text: Lovely dolly to use, easy to assemble and ready to go. I have boxes of Christmas decorations in the garage need to move into the house. Do it only in one trip with this dolly. I'll be using it for my grocery trips so i don't have to go between the car and the house for so many times!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M.

customer_reviews.title: Fair price but low quality. Can't recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Easy to assemble. - Light and easy to push. - Comes in several colors. - Decent price. Cons -Light thin metal that flexes a lot more than a 300lb rated dolly cart should. MAYBE NOT 300LB RATED? -Bumper skirt won't stay on leaving metal protruding out to put some pain on shins of the unsuspecting. -Build quality is lacking, it just looks and feels like it's gonna break if I use it on something heavy.
customer_reviews.author: MeThePerson

customer_reviews.title: Weight capacity is a lie!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. Says it is rated for 660 lb so I planned on using it for my salt cart at work where I need to load 6 to 7 50 lb bags from upstairs to downstairs. Now I am not a math wiz but I am pretty sure that 6, 50 lb bags of salt is less than 600 lbs. Well the cart lasted about 2 trips before the frame started bending and now today after its 5th trip the wheels completely collapsed in and it is un-usable. Will also mention that when it is pulled with nothing on it, it is extremely loud. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cart for the price. Handy and easy to lift.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't classify this as heavy duty , but for me it was perfect to help move heavy soil bags and heavy boxes. Its not very large so not for furniture. For what it is and its easy folding its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for almost a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to move a coffee table that was 350 lbs an year and a half ago. I have used it to move boxes and mail, but never approaching a 600lb load. Last month I noticed little ball bearings coming from the cart. The wheels where losing ball bearings and is now very difficult to maneuver. If I used this every day moving heavy things, I could understand wear and tear, but I don't use it that often and again, for lighter loads. So be aware.
customer_reviews.author: M. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Functional bed length of dolly is shorter than stated due to the folding hinges.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light-weight flat bed dolly. It folds simply and can be easily stored away or transported if needed for store pick-ups of large or heavy items. I returned this item and purchased the larger model because I need the extra length for transporting kitchen cabinets to a remodeling project. I also found the handle to be uncomfortably short (I'm a 5' 4" woman). The bed surface is very slippery and I plan to attach a non-skid material to the flat bed when my larger dolly arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect little cart to haul all your products at vendor ...
customer_reviews.text: iI saw this cart being used by a woman at a Christmas fair. She saw me making several trips with all my products and let me use hers.It is the perfect little cart to haul all your products at vendor events. The colors even match my brand. It works well and folds easily. I'm so happy I treated myself to this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: So good it was stolen mid move
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine, it was a little smaller than expected, but it got the job done. We moved a couch on it, moved a full bed frame. Moved a series of containers/boxes. The items did slide around on it a bit, but with friends to help balance it was fairly easy. As we were about 2/3'rds through moving our items, we brought our couch in, walked back outside, and it was gone. Vanished into thin air. Stolen right out from under us. I hope whoever has it can update this review and let me know how its longevity is. But it worked great for the 4.5 hours we used it. 8/10, would use it for 1/2 a day again.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: great litlle cart
customer_reviews.text: reviewed by Gabrielle: I like the folding handle on this cart. I use it to transport my xl sized pet carrier into and out of the vet's office. The vet staff liked being able to pull the cart instead of lugging the heavy carrier into the office. It is also nice to carry my stuff into a craft show for setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for DIY movers
customer_reviews.text: I lived in a top floor apartment and was moving out over several weeks. This cart paid for itself several times over. I know some have mentioned it was loud and they are right. On carpet or wood it’s ok but tile floors with grout lines it was the loudest noise since you’ve tried to sneak out of the house as a teenager. I’d tilt the cart up on two wheels in the tile hallway coming and going so my neighbors didn’t key my car. If you’re using this for moving, also get some bungee cords. You can stack up the cart so much more with those suckers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and store
customer_reviews.text: If you want a small cart that you can use to haul boxes (like dishes) this is the dolly for you. If, however, you are looking for something that will haul that small steel safe - not so much. It is truly easy to assemble and very easy to store. I have a large dolly for hauling heavy objects but for those smaller items, this is just perfect. It does require a little practice on maneuvering it but, once you get the "hang" of it, you'll have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: GeeGee Hampton

customer_reviews.title: This is great little cart!
customer_reviews.text: I moved to another unit in my building so I bought this to move as much stuff myself as I could. When I first got it I thought it might be too small but that turned out to be a good thing as it made maneuvering through my apartment much easier. This little beast is a true workhorse!! I don’t know how much my stuff weighed so I just piled on whatever would fit...it was super easy to push down the hallway and I never had any problems. The wheels were easy to put on and it folds flat for easy storage. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CAMI DARNEY

customer_reviews.title: A best buy!
customer_reviews.text: AN EXCELLENT push cart dolly. IT is well made, ready to use right out of the box; very easily maneuverable and sufficient strength for moving boxes/ coolers; but light enough to fold up and lift into car trunk after use. It arrived in 'new' condition, and works flawlessly. I am very pleased w/ this purchase; am already using w/ complete satisfaction. I appreciate the quick delivery of this item which arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Missing the bolts... Useless!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is extremely well made. Unfortunatly, I cannot use it because the bolts were missing so I cannot attach the wheels!!! I really needed to use it this weekend... 😕 Contacted the company and left a voice mail and hit no response! It cost me $10 to get the bolts and washers so I can use the damn thing! And the bumper gasket to protect walls was wien away on both front corners and then came off. While the product is sturdy, the rest had been a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Defective bolts prevented full assembly
customer_reviews.text: Most of the bolts went in pretty smoothly, but one holw on the swivel-wheel bracket would not accept any of the remaining (extra) bolts. They need to screw in enough so that you can then tighten them down with a wrench. But the (aligned) hole would not allow any of the bolts that were left. After 1-1/2 hour, I gave up -- so the cart is not going to be stable over time and use because the bolts were defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gill

customer_reviews.title: The Wellmax push cart is well worth the few extra dollars...
customer_reviews.text: The Wellmax push cart is well worth the few extra dollars. It is a quality product, sturdy, and well designed. While easy to assemble, you should use a quality wrench or socket - not the wrench included with the package. I used Locktite to secure the wheel assembly mounting bolts. The cart handles well, is light-weight for carrying, and handles a moderate weight load. This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Great dolly for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this platform dolly. I can more 6 decent sized containers easily, and have used it to help me move furniture also. The only negative is I wish that it had 4 swivel casters with locks on them. This would make moving things through narrow turns and tight spaces much easier. If I found a cart with 4 rotating wheels with locks, I would replace this with it for a lot of what I use it for, but either way, it will be useful to me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate this Push Cart Dolly
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/hate relationship with this cart. The base works great for my purposes -- moving bins filled with photographic art. The light weight makes it really easy for me lift in and out of my van. The folding handle makes it possible to transport. Now the hate part; when folding or opening the handle, because it is light weight, the base tends to "flip up" and "nail me" if I don't have it braced against something solid. I've learned to use the tires of the car or some other solid structure when opening or closing the handle.
customer_reviews.author: E Faithe Lester

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY ACCURATE DESCRIPTION BY MANUFACTURER
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid trolley. After reading of problems with small canvas wagons this device became my best option. For the money paid this cart was worth it. If I am transporting multiple small packages I use a bungee to prevent any uneven path problems from jostling items off. Solidly built for long term use. Easy to assemble. I am pleased with this purchase and the speed of delivery after ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: wyman2004

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cart!
customer_reviews.text: So I was planning a trip to NYC and knew I needed something to haul all my stuff into the apt I was staying in and found this awesome cart. It is sturdy and well made. Putting the wheels on was no problem as some other carts had reviews that the holes didn't line up. This is very well made at a great price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this cart when I got it. Very difficult to attach wheels and is very noisy when it is in motion. It is hard to maneuver and heavy to lift into my car. Now to top it off, yesterday, the back wheels fell off. The front wheels are still firmly attached so I knew it wasn't due to the way I had initially put the wheels on. I've had it with this thing and would take it to Goodwill but don't want anyone paying a nickel for it. Harshest review I have ever submitted.
customer_reviews.author: LuannaS3

customer_reviews.title: Wellmax - NO reply on small request
customer_reviews.text: The cart is fine but one of the washer on the bottom is defected as seen in the photo. Called Amazon for a replacement washer but I was told the only way will be to send the whole thing back, or contact Wellmax. Of course I contacted Wellmax through Amazon's portal and sent email through its websit portal to customer service. It has been 2 weeks. I receive no reponse at all. Overall rating could be five stars if they have a little concern!
customer_reviews.author: Banker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cart for Small Moves
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I are still in the middle of moving but I had to stop and say how amazing this little cart is. It folds up neatly, and has been great for moving some really heavy boxes between apartments. The only improvement in my opinion would be to make the handle a little bit higher or telescopic to adjust the height, but that's a very small issue. It's great. I will recommend it to anyone who's looking for something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I am a portable classroom and this helps me haul extra items, especially instruments depending on what I am teaching at the time. I just fold it, stand it up on my back floor of vehicle. Then I can pull it out and open it and load my instruments. To keep them from flying off, I use bungee cords to hold everything in place. Plan to use this to help our daughter moving in and out of the dorm too!
customer_reviews.author: TTerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are hard plastic, so very noisy if youre on a indoor hard floor that isnt completely smooth. Other than that, I love it. I wish the bed was a bit longer but I cant dock them a point for that because I knew what the dimensions were when I bought it and also they are fairly standard dimensions roughly speaking. Im hopeful it stands up over time because even though Im not loading it up really heavy, I use it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is more sturdy than my previous lighter one that went missing. With a carrying load of 320 lbs I should be fine. The cart arrived in time. The only assembly needed was putting the wheels on which was easy--they even supplied the wrench so I did not have to hunt up any tools, Would recommend this cart to anyone in the market for a sturdy cart. Jo Anna
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid Construction, easy to fold handle and stick in the car trunk. Rolls smoothly over both carpet and hard surfaces. Easily handles loads up to the 330# load rating (actually, will handle more than 330# without any noticeable problem). Exactly what I was looking for. I was a bit concerned about one of the comments in a review that said the push cart was "poorly constructed" and "not very durable". Sure doesn't match my evaluation of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Howell

customer_reviews.title: Durability,
customer_reviews.text: This product broke down during my first use. I was moving less than half a mile away to another location and the wheels and screws broke off on the way there. Now I’m left with a dolley that does not have multiple screws and has bent parts. I bought the more expensive option because I was worried that this would occur. It did, and now I have lost money in a product that couldn’t serve its purpose at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Works great on most surfaces
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with this. It has been a tremendous help with our move. Only one set of wheels move in all directions the others are stabilized. That meant a few times I had to lift that set just enough to get it moved in the direction I needed but it was pretty easy to do. Note: it will not roll on gravel when loaded down. I imagine this would also be an issue on sand. They are definitely not all terrain wheels.
customer_reviews.author: JenLivingLife

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: This a great help to me when taking my cat in her carrier to the vet. The carrier plus cat is heavy. I just place the carrier on the cart and push it like a stroller. Just wish it had a break. It can get unruly and roll away.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lace

customer_reviews.title: Light enough to push but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am using this push cart to move boxes as we are packing up and move to a new house. This cart feels sturdy and easy to move around. We have not use it to move boxes but our kids love pushing each other around the house so it’s a keeper !
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart for a couple of local trade shows so I didn't have to rent/borrow a cart or two-wheeler to bring our display items into the building. Very easy to assemble, lightweight, and has a decent capacity for its size. Folds up fairly compact where I can store in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: Makes my job so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cart! I purchased it to lug back and forth various art supplies and artwork. Some of my art supplies are heavy, unusual shaped and bulky. It folds down and fits in my trunk and my back-seat. It's also light weight and holds a ton of weight! This cart saves my back and many multiple trips back and forth. Now, I can load it up and go!
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS E CANTRELL JR

customer_reviews.title: Great value, held up fine.
customer_reviews.text: Held up for our move, carrying surprisingly heavy loads back and forth. The bar you push down to fold it up slept out of its holding a few times, but simple enough to put back together. The wires in the spring that push the bar down are bending a bit. Parts of it seem a little thin or flimsy, but hey, it held together fine. I don't know how long this thing will hold up, but for the price, it did everything it needed to.
customer_reviews.author: RyanK

customer_reviews.title: Handiest household tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I share this item and we think it is the greatest and handiest tool ever. The cart is rather small but holds a lot and we can move boxes and bird cages with ease. Several boxes or one bird cage at a time. It folds up easily too when you want to store it. We are old ladies and it works for us! Highly recommend every household have this item.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmabirdy

customer_reviews.title: This is money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I am a potter. Nothing I sell is light, and I'm in my sixties. This is easy to keep in my car's trunk, easily folded up, and makes moving heavy pottery a breeze, when going to shows and markets. It also helps me move my fifty pound boxes of clay from one place to another without strain. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: POLLI

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed to make my move easier!
customer_reviews.text: This was just exactly what I was hoping for!! I moved recently, and though I had movers to move the big stuff, this really helped with getting my smaller, more fragile items fromt the car into my home. It is lightweight, but holds 350 pounds (That's what the info says -- I didn't have anything that heavy, but it carried 'full' loads). I am still using it to move groceries from my car to my door, and inside. It folds almost flat -- and as an 'elder', I am able to 'open/close' it with absolutely no problem!! One of my best purchases in a while!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Flat bed rolling cart
customer_reviews.text: I love the cart! So much. I had fallen trying to juggle grocery bags. So with this cart, I can layer boxes and bags and get everything rolled into the house to spots to unload. The bar is almost the height of my rolling walker handles and, while there is not a braking mechanism, I can park it against a wall or cabinet and it stays put. Very happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: A good value in a portable push cart/dolly
customer_reviews.text: The cart is constructed well and a good value, providing 600 lb capacity with a light weight, important for a portable cart used at remote locations. Like any new cart or dolly with swivel wheels it works best with some load. The swivel wheels have a rubber bearing seal which works best with load and a warmer environment. I think this will improve as the cart is broken in.
customer_reviews.author: ChesterBill

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first six months- then the wheels fall off
customer_reviews.text: This cart was perfect out of the box. Easy to assemble, easy to maneuver- exactly what I was hoping for. After about six months of use (mainly used for moving boxes around a warehouse- well within the 650 capacity), the cart did not roll so well anymore. After further investigation I found that the ball bearings for one of the wheels had completely fallen out and the other three wheels were starting to fall apart. Contacted Wellmax to see if they offer replacement wheels- have not heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usefulness and value.
customer_reviews.text: This is needed as I will be moving next month and this Dolly will be helpful moving some of the heavier boxes, So far, so good. Incidentally, it is not yellow. It is orange. But that is no problem. I like the fact that it will store well. The pivoting wheels are great too.
customer_reviews.author: norine karwel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I moved a pickup truck load of plants with it. Made life so much easier. She just bought one for herself. Sturdy. Well made. Easy to assemble. Use your own good wrench to tighten the 16 bolts. I will move bags of gravel with it today.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! However it came dented..
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great cart, that manuvers smoothly, and is made well. I bought it to transport my piano stand, bench, and 50lb keyboard. It works very well!! My disappointment was...it came with marks on it, and the metal looked dirty already. For $83 I was expecting pristine. The packaging was very beat up and it arrived dented. All of that aside it works well and I only wish it came in better shape.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSheffield

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cart. I love the large flat "bed" that can hold a lot of boxes. It's sturdy, we've routinely dropped 50 lbs boxes onto it and it's holding up well. We've moved 300 lbs on it with no issue. It is a fairly long rectangle so the only issue is really tight spaces, but it maneuvers well even in those. Very pleased! Would be satisfied at twice the price, it's that good!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great cart - very easy to assemble & handy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I am a small older woman. It was easy to assemble, although I wish the instructions explicitly stated that the swivel wheels go in front. It’s very sturdy & easy to maneuver. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mary  LaChapelle

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart work great and is exactly what I needed for my small business. I have a large printer and other things I can't carry. It is very durable and rolls nicely. I would recommend. Handle does not extend so if you are tall it might not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J. Little

customer_reviews.title: Crap broke under a year
customer_reviews.text: Crap broke under a year. Use it to carry inventory for a small restaurant. Used it twice a week every load always under 350lbs. Ball bearings in the wheel fell out. Platform dented under weight. Never went pass or got close to weight limit. Cheap plastic wheels. I'm pretty sure it's fine for around the house but for commercial use spend some money and get a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Charliemac10

customer_reviews.title: Loving my cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to help with our upcoming move - we are moving to the other end of the block and I hope to do a lot of the move myself. This cart is the perfect size for boxes you pack your self and for smaller furniture items. It's a little bulky to keep in the back of your car for hauling groceries so I'll probably buy something smaller for that.
customer_reviews.author: kznailz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this cart. I've used it for so many things already and it's only been here a week. Great size, not huge but a great size for any projects I need. It went through the yard and it wheeled right along. It folds to store, I hang mine. The wheels work smoothly and the poundage it can hold is great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shirk

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i got this push cart and happy i did..i thought the price was reasonable...was easy to assemble too....this is just what i was looking for ...and storing is gona be easy too it folds up...
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to break my back!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of this push cart. It is foldable and stores easily. I got the heavy duty one so that I could carry heavy boxes.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great for trade shows!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 660 pound capacity cart. The product works great for hauling items in and out of trade shows. Love the fact that we can fold it up for storage as well. Wheels work great, they don't get stuck. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for heavy duty jobs
customer_reviews.text: I needed it for moving and I thought with a 330 pound load limit I would have a little more control of the cart. It is lightweight and it folds up those are good qualities but I did not feel good about loading it up and having good control. If you need to move lighter loads the cart is great but for 300 pound loads, I am not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, even for a lady to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a very fine cart, even for me to push around. Some carts are just too ugly to use, they seem more for construction sites. This has a very appealing look. As a trainer, I will definitively use this cart to move my training materials.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Emilia Concepción

customer_reviews.title: It was large enough and sturdy enough to hold her weight
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this cart for the typical reason. My rottweiler developed bone cancer, and for the last week of her life we were able to get her around using this cart. It was large enough and sturdy enough to hold her weight. Forever grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Carter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Live in a large apartment complex, needed it for groceries/packages, it was convenient while it lasted, 4 uses. On the 5th use I went to get my groceries from the Instacart deliverer and all my groceries fell over on the floor BECAUSE ONE OF THE WHEELS fell off. The person was nice enough to help me bring up my groceries. I was really disappointed, the wheel is nowhere to be found so I can’t even reattach it. Seriously for $65 it doesn’t even last. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart is cheaply made and a bit flimsy. The wrench included is garbage, you will be better off to use your own tools to install and tighten the wheels. That all said as long as your loads don't exceed half the capacity and you are gentle with the card it should work for a while. Don't expect to get much repeated use out of this but for a one time job it will probably work if you treat it gently.
customer_reviews.author: LD

product_meta.title: Push Cart Dolly by Wellmax, Moving Platform Hand Truck, Foldable for Easy Storage and 360 Degree Swivel Wheels with 330lb Weight Capacity, Yellow Color
product_meta.description:
Size Name:330 Lbs| Color:Yellow

Innovative design for compact storage

 * Say goodbye to big, bulky carts that take up precious space.
 * Tuck away for easy storage, but ready and available for when you need it.
 * Fold down the padded handle in seconds to lay flush on the platform.

Functionally built to maneuver with confidence

 * Built for easy maneuverability and maximum stability. 
 * Four secure, heavy duty wheels offer seamless and reliable transportation 
 * 2 back wheels engineered with 360-degree swivel functionality for easy transit. 

Made from high quality materials for long term use

 * Custom support guard ensures items won’t slip backwards.
 * Handle your items with confidence - a platform cart that can hold up to 330lbs.
 * Engineered using only the highest quality materials.

A durable multipurpose utility cart for anywhere, anytime use.

 * Move household items, wood planks, gardening tools, luggage, office supplies with ease.
 * Perfect for easy storage in your garage, basement, office, storage closet or warehouse.
 * Suitable for indoor and outdoor use.
feature_bullets: COMPACT & FOLDABLE - Are you tired of big, clunky carts that take up precious space? That’s why we designed a functional platform push cart that can be tucked away for easy storage, but ready and available for when you need it. Simply fold down the padded handle in seconds to lay flush on the platform and your cart is ready to stowaway whenever, wherever.

EASILY MANEUVERABLE - This four wheel platform push cart is built for easy maneuverability and maximum stability. The four secure, heavy duty wheels offer seamless and reliable transportation for your items and materials. And for sharp angles and getting around corners, the two back wheels are engineered with 360-degree swivel functionality for easy transit.

MAXIMUM SUPPORT - We want you to be able to handle your materials and items with confidence. That’s why we’ve engineered a push cart that can hold up to 330lbs. The custom support guard ensures items won’t slip backwards and arrive safely to where they need to be.

STURDY & DURABLE - Quality made products are at the core of our mission here at Wellmax. We build for long-term use and functionality. Everything from the sturdy padded handle for optimal comfort to the textured, non-slip platform, this cart is all about functionality. Engineered using only the highest quality materials, this platform dolly will be a staple item that you can rely on for years to come.

MULTIPURPOSE - Our customers love to use the Wellmax push cart for a variety of different needs. Whether you’re moving household items, wood planks or luggage, this dolly can do it all! And regardless of where it’s used, the foldable structure is perfect for easy storage in your garage, basement, office, storage closet or warehouse.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,057 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
